local_intent: Controlled placement: verify plate visibility, approach above plate, descend until contact, place at plate center, release, and retreat.
assumptions: Workspace around plate is collision-free for top-down approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase around LowerUntilContact, then PlaceAt with yaw 0 and press 10, followed by release and retreat, matching the GLOBAL_BT and description.
